metadata.title: SUITMEISTER Christmas Blazers for Men | Different Prints | Slim Fit | Perfect Jacket for Xmas or Costume Parties
features: CHRISTMAS GREEN NORDIC: This green Christmas blazer is made for anyone who likes to dress up in fun clothes during the holidays but wants to look good at the same time. It's the perfect costume for all kinds of holiday occasions, from the company party to the family dinner.

CHECK YOUR SIZE: Our awesome blazers are outstanding in any situation, so help yourself out and make sure to measure yourself! You don't want to ruin the party with a small jacket, do you? Check the measure guide within the images and make sure that you receive a size that suits your needs! The blazer fitting is Slim Fit, so if you are doubting between two sizes, we advise to pick the larger one!

PERFECT FOR XMAS: Stylish, high-quality printed xmas jacket. A perfect costume to wear at Christmas office parties, a family Christmas diner party, theme parties, or any festive events where you want to stand out.

INCLUDED IN YOUR OUTFIT: All blazers have button closure, inside pockets and a modern tailored cut for a stylish fit. The Suitmeister men's blazers consist out of 100% Polyester & are Machine Washable. The package is including 1 blazer.

ABOUT SUITMEISTER: Show your sense of humor and your sense of style at the same time with an outfit from Suitmeister. If you're looking for high quality clothing at cool prices you've come to the right place.
description: Looking for an outfit to go out of the year with a bang? This festive Christmas costume is the perfect outfit for the x-mas and New Year’s Eve season. It’s a more stylish version on the ugly Christmas sweater, so you’ll be the best-dressed of your family and friends for sure! You’ll probably get away with spending less hours in the kitchen, and maybe Santa will even give you more presents than ever because of your great Christmas attire. So, what are you waiting for? Just dress to impress during the most wonderful time of the year; get yourself (or that special someone) a fun Christmas suit!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "15 x 12 x 1.25 inches", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "October 17, 2019", "Manufacturer": "Suitmeister"}
